title: Science Problem-Solving Project through Virtual Team Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and experience using online collaboration tools
context.additional_context: Parallel implementation of team processes and real-world problem-solving in science within an offline environment equipped with digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can communicate effectively with virtual team members using Google Workspace tools
Learners can analyze conflicts arising in team collaboration processes and propose resolution strategies
Learners can complete collaborative projects by dividing roles with team members to solve scientific problems
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
